Conversation.value: Hey I heard from the Police Chief that you've been doing some great work for the town. I could use your help if you have the time.
Thank you so much, I need 10 fire hoses. The ones we do have have a ton of holes in them and will not work.

Response.value: That's what I'm here to do right?

Conversation.value: Haha, very cool. I need 10 fire hoses. The ones we do have have a ton of holes in them and will not work.
...I need 10 fire hoses. Come back when you get em.
